message: Let's start fair.  I'm willing to split it 60/40 in my favor.  Hope we can agree on this!
Alice, your offer was quite generous, but let's be realistic.  How about a 70/30 split in my favor?  Think about it, this deal gets worse for you with every round!
Okay, let's try a 50/50 split this time. I think this is a fair offer, and it avoids any more losses due to inflation.
